logger.doc:name: Start Logger
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "logger": "Start Logger", "correlationId": vars.correlationId default "N/A", "transactionId": vars.transactionId default "N/A", "dateTime": now() as String { format: "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'" }, "flow": flow.name default "unknown-flow", "layer": "system" }]

http:request.http:query-params: #[{ "latitude": vars.latitude, "longitude": vars.longitude, "start_date": vars.start_date, "end_date": vars.'end_date', "daily": vars.daily, "timezone": vars.timezone }]

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "time": payload.daily.time, "temperature_2m_max": payload.daily.temperature_2m_max, "temperature_2m_min": payload.daily.temperature_2m_min, "precipitation_sum": payload.daily.precipitation_sum }

logger.doc:name: End Logger
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "logger": "End Logger", "correlationId": vars.correlationId default "N/A", "transactionId": vars.transactionId default "N/A", "dateTime": now() as String { format: "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'" }, "flow": flow.name default "unknown-flow", "layer": "system" }]
